data.name: Rebirth
data.detailed_description:
The images in the screenshots will differ from the end product of the game. We are actively working full time to finish development before the deadline on Halloween 2019 the screenshots will continue to update as we continue to update the game. Thank you for your patience!

Story

You are Toby, a boy who's life was changed after entering a state of comatose when a car accident sent him to the hospital. Toby wakes up as his favorite stuffed toy in a strange world greeted by a flying cat named Leo. The only way out of his coma is to fight for his life and get back to reality, or be stuck in this world forever...


You Choose Who Can Leave and Who Will Stay

Rebirth is a game filled with tears and laughter. Feel like a hero in the beginning of your adventure by defeating your nightmares and sending the people of your choosing on a one way ticket out of this world. Then, feel the desperation in their voices as your journey comes to an end and they realize that not all of them can go home.

What You Will Experience


  • A breathtaking story about a boy and his journey home
  • Choices will affect how other people in the world act as your journey progresses
  • Outstanding original music unique to each fight
  • Challenging reflex based boss fights

A Unique and Dynamic Health Bar

  • Health does not regenerate
  • Receive rewards by sending people home
  • Exchange rewards for life points to continue your fight

data.short_description: Fight your way out of a coma filled with nightmares...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 64-bit only
  • Processor: 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gtx 970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0
  • Graphics: Gtx 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
